item.title: Lecture Notes
item.description: Lecture notes by Victor Chernozhukov (MIT) and Ivan Fernandez-Val (BU). LEC # TOPIC 1 Least Squares, Adaptive Partialling-Out, Simultaneous Inference (PDF) 2 Structural Equations Models and IV, Take 1 (PDF) 3 Structural Equations Models and GMM (PDF) 4 Euler Equations, Nonlinear GMM, and Other Adventures (PDF) 5 Bootstrapping (PDF) 6 Nonlinear and Binary Regression, Predictive Effects, and M-Estimation (PDF) 7 Distribution Regression and Counterfactual Analysis 8 Linear Panel Data Models Under Strict and Weak Exogeneity (PDF) 9 GMM Under Moderately High Dimensions (PDF) 10 Nonlinear Panel Data (PDF)
